update t_room_distributer
distributer_id = #{distributerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lecturer_id = #{lecturerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend_num = #{recommendNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
course_num = #{courseNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
done_num = #{doneNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},

where room_distributer_id = #{roomDistributerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_room_distributer set distributer_id = #{distributerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lecturer_id = #{lecturerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend_num = #{recommendNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, course_num = #{courseNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, done_num = #{doneNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, profit_share_rate = #{profitShareRate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, rq_code = #{rqCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, done_time = #{doneTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where room_distributer_id = #{roomDistributerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update t_room_distributer set recommend_num = recommend_num + 1 where distributer_id = #{distributer_id} and room_id = #{room_id}
update t_room_distributer set done_num = done_num + #{done_num}, total_amount = total_amount + #{total_amount}, done_time = #{done_time} where rq_code = #{rq_code}
